basics.name: Brandon Kumalaa
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027 and hope to find a job in Hawaii as a data scientist.

work.summary: Administrator at the Youth Service Center
highlights: Reviewing registration forms and documents submitted by parents.
Notifying and assisting parents through email.
Entering data and status of families based on the information provided.

awards.title: Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen who are Hawai'i residents and had a high-school cumulative GPA of a 3.6 or higher.
